titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Labor should recognize the unique circumstances of farm family youth workers when issuing regulations under the Fair Labor Standards Act relating to hired farm workers under the age of 16.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 12/16/2011--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Labor should recognize the unique circumstances of agricultural farm family youth workers and multi-generational family partnerships when issuing regulations under the Fair Labor Standards with respect to hired farm workers under the age of 16.
